name: Haste - Demo
description:
-Haste is a runner set in a Viking world,

-It's level based not endless .. a hardcore platformer

-Vili & Ve, The two Viking heroes will be going from level to another,

Running,jumping and sliding ,trying to overcome the different obstacles the game throws at them, 

In order to Find their Viking Brother Odin.

-This Demo have the first 10 levels of the game ( WebGL ), you can play it online

The full game will be paid, it will be uploaded soon, stay tuned..

-Report bugs in the comment section.

-"CONTROLLERS ARE NOT SUPPORTED"

-Thank You For Playing 'Haste-Demo'
